question: does anyone know anything about low platelet levels during pregnancy? mine are 111 at 33 weeks, which is getting on the low side. however i already know that i do no have gestational diabetes, high blood pressure or protien in my urine. does anyone know how to increase your platelet levels safely? they say that if i drop below 100 they might not want to give me an epidurel.any comments on this?
title: blood tests!!
